data.title: Roma {Rome} (Diocese) [Catholic
data.text:
Bishop(s)

Jorge Mario Bergoglio, S.J., Pope

Baldassare Reina, Vicegerent

Benoni Ambăruş, Auxiliary Bishop

Michele Di Tolve, Auxiliary Bishop

Dario Gervasi, Auxiliary Bishop

Paolo Ricciardi, Auxiliary Bishop

Daniele Salera, Auxiliary Bishop

Camillo Ruini, Cardinal, Vicar General Emeritus

Agostino Vallini, Cardinal, Vicar General Emeritus

Enzo Dieci, Auxiliary Bishop Emeritus

Guerino Di Tora, Auxiliary Bishop Emeritus

Paolino Schiavon, Auxiliary Bishop Emeritus

Paolo Selvadagi, Auxiliary Bishop Emeritus

Albano (Suburbicarian See)

Anagni-Alatri

Civita Castellana

Civitavecchia-Tarquinia

Latina-Terracina-Sezze-Priverno

Ostia (Suburbicarian See)

Palestrina (Suburbicarian See)

Tivoli

Viterbo

General Information

Type of Jurisdiction: Diocese

Erected: 1st Century

Metropolitan See

Rite: Latin (or Roman)

Country: Italy

Square Kilometers: 881 (340 Square Miles)

Conference Region: Lazio

Official Web Site: http://www.diocesidiroma.it/

Vatican Web Site: http://www.vatican.va/

Official Web Site (old): http://www.vicariatusurbis.org/

Mailing Address: The Apostolic Palace, 00120 Vatican City, Europe
